subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Good Box...Bad Box
author: Anne
full_text:
Steve,

I don't know anything about wiring or electronics, but I'm wondering if, 
with both boxes going, it does something to your wiring?  Not because of the 
spirits, but just because it creates a load? LOL, load is probably not the 
correct electrical term..  Or is your wiring okay?  I hate to see you frying 
all your appliances!!

Anne

----- Original Message ----- 
From: "Steve Hultay" <urkel23@...>
To: <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, July 30, 2007 7:53 AM
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Good Box...Bad Box


> Wow, that's a lot of info to think about.  I thought i was alone
> with this.  When i first started i had asked for a sign that i was
> actually speaking to someone and my ceiling fan stopped for a few
> seconds and than started again.  The next day it wouldn't work at
> all, so i pulled the switch out of the wall and it was completely
> fried.  I luckily had a spare and re-installed it and it works fine
> again, but lesson was learned from that.  Don't ask for a sign b
> ecause you never know what they will do, and that goes for with or
> without a box.  They do listen and will pull energy from anywhere
> they can to achieve it.  I think that explains the appliances going
> out, i will ask a question and right before they answer something in
> the house will flicker or go out.  Sometimes they say "I did that"
> to take credit for shutting something off.  It's all about energy
> and how we use it in life and in death.
>
> -Steve H.
>
>
>
>
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Frank Sumption" <franks-boxes@...>
> wrote:
>>
>> I never paid much attention as to which boxes produced more
> negatives, but I
>> used to get alot when I first started this stuff. I tend to ignore
> those,
>> and sometimes if it's in a segment I copy to the computer I'll
> play it
>> backward. Reversed, sometimes the evil voices are angelic.  That's
> curious
>> about it shutting off aplliances, I thought those ran on internal
> batteries.
>> Maybe you're getting a lesson in energies?
>>
>> I did get a quake warning in last nights test, it said  China
> suffers a
>> quake, followed by August 11. I usually don't get dates, or
> locations, so I
>> guess wait any see, of maybe they can evacuate China? Often, when
> a quake is
>> coming I get a wolf image, well there's a wolf face on the shower
> window,
>> kind of a medium size wolf, so I think if there is a quake it
> won't be real
>> severe, maybe like a 6 or 7. Wolves for quakes, cats for wind, and
> bears for
>> tsunamis, which I didn't know ahead of time. For Katrina I had a
> cat(image)
>> with huge round eyes.
>>
>>
>> Frank
>> >From: "Steve Hultay" <urkel23@...>
>> >Reply-To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>> >To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>> >Subject: [EVP-ITC] Good Box...Bad Box
>> >Date: Mon, 30 Jul 2007 00:42:01 -0000
>> >
>> >
>> >Does anybody think it's possible to get 2 extreme opposites in
>> >communication?  1 Box curses at me constantly and tells me to die
> and
>> >also talks about the end of the world and hell.  And the other one
>> >talks about how pretty it is there and i always get "Hi" and "I'm
>> >Here" as well as "Don't leave" when i'm signing off and an
>> >occasional "Goodbye".  Has anyone experienced anything like this
>> >before?  The 1 box even shuts off appliances in my house when i
> use
>> >it, i guess i'll stop using that one for now until i figure out a
>> >solution to what's going on.  Any ideas?????
>> >
>> >-Steve H.
>> >
>>
